title: Heart Breaker Garen
body:
I believe this skin would suit Garen due to his back story between him and kats love story his abilities would be 
Q : when he silences you love heart surround you 
W : his shield is a love heart
E : he spins around with love hearts surrounding him
R : his ult would be a love heart with a sword going threw it
His sword would be a red sword of some sort have no shirt and a red cape

replies.body: You had me until red cape.
